Articles.Content:
Aircraft wheels! I only have FS. Does anyone know where else to get some nice ones? Having a variety of differently-shaped gears + tweakscale is the BEST.

Edited October 17, 2014 by SmiteZero
TT Multiwheels, and there's some in B9 Aerospace that look nice, and I think KAX has some as well.

KAX as far as i know has only 1 landing gear. Though, its BEAUTIFUL!!!

But yea, you won't find much landing gear mods, most people make rocket parts or airplane parts, but rarely landing gear/leg parts...
Retro Future has a few good ones.

Thank-you.

I'm not around much. What's KAX?

KAX: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668

RF has 5 or 6 different gears. 1 or 2 in the pipeline.

KAX: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668

RF has 5 or 6 different gears. 1 or 2 in the pipeline.

Ah, thanks! It needs a .25 update right now though. I'll keep watching for it.

Ah, thanks! It needs a .25 update right now though. I'll keep watching for it.

the Gear should work fine. I tested it briefly before in 0.25 and everything appeared functional.
